sentences.sContent: I/ you/ we/ they like giraffe.
sentences.sCn: 我/你/我们/他们喜欢长颈鹿。

sentences.sContent: So they sent me a … giraffe!
sentences.sCn: 于是他们又送我一只…长颈鹿。

sentences.sContent: Can I get the mommy giraffe for Christmas?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can I get the mommy giraffe for Christmas?
sentences.sCn: 我在圣诞节能得到一个长颈鹿妈妈吗？

trans.tranOther: a tall African animal with a very long neck and legs and dark spots on its yellow-brown fur
